abstract: Series of connections unite Cleveland Browns president Mike Holmgren, coach Pat Shurmur and Shurmur's uncle Fritz Shurmur, innovative defensive assistant who died in 1999.
snippet: Browns Coach Pat Shurmur had a special relationship with his uncle, Fritz Shurmur, as did Mike Holmgren, the Browns’ president.
lead_paragraph: Browns Coach Pat Shurmur had a special relationship with his uncle, Fritz Shurmur, as did Mike Holmgren, the Browns’ president.

headline.main: In Cleveland, a Circle Is Completed
headline.print_headline: In Cleveland, A Circle Is Completed
headline.seo: Browns Team Leaders Share Intersecting Bonds
